title: ARRIS Announces DCX3635 Media Gateway and IP815 Wireless Media Player Availability for MOXI WHS Customers
text:
ARRIS Announces DCX3635 Media Gateway and IP815 Wireless Media Player Availability for MOXI WHS Customers   Published on 2015-10-15 08:15:31 ARRIS Announces DCX3635 Media Gateway and IP815 Wireless Media Player Availability for... -- SUWANEE, Ga.   > SUWANEE, Ga.   ARRIS Group Inc . (NASDAQ: ARRS ) today announced the availability of its DCX3635 Media Gateway and IP815 Media Player for MOXI® Whole Home Solution (WHS) customers -- offering powerful new CPE options for delivering IP-based entertainment. The ARRIS DCX3635 and the ARRIS IP815 are new platform additions to the ARRIS WHS product family. The ARRIS DCX3635 combines the award-winning MOXI User Interface and customized content experience with powerful new hardware that supports front-end RF, DOCSIS® 3.0, MoCA 2.0, 802.11ac Wi-Fi. This headed digital video gateway platform offers operators a new way to offer solutions to single or multi-room homes. The ARRIS DCX3635 works with the new ARRIS IP815, a wireless media player that seamlessly extends the full MOXI WHS experience to additional rooms in the house. Together, the DCX3635 and IP815 enable operators to deliver personalized, fully featured entertainment, anywhere in the home. "Today's consumers demand high-quality entertainment on their terms," said Debbie Stackis , SVP & GM of Consumer Solutions at ARRIS. "Our MOXI Whole Home Solution offers a feature-rich, personalized solution that integrates seamlessly with our media gateway and player to give operators a broader range of choices for delivering tomorrow's entertainment." About the ARRIS DCX3635 and ARRIS IP815 The ARRIS DCX3635 offers full integration with the MOXI WHS experience and works with the ARRIS IP815 Media Player. It delivers whole-home IP-based entertainment using 6 video tuners with 8 DOCSIS downstream channels, and 1TB of onboard storage. Combined with the ARRIS IP815, the DCX3635 can offer a (wireless) multi-room video experience. About ARRIS ARRIS Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: ARRS ) is a world leader in entertainment and communications technology. Our innovations combine hardware, software, and services across the cloud, network, and home to power TV and Internet for millions of people around the globe. The people of ARRIS collaborate with the world's top service providers, content providers, and retailers to advance the state of our industry and pioneer tomorrow's connected world.
